Intro.title: Hey, I'm Javi
Intro.text: I have been working in web development for several years, primarily remotely. My expertise lies in frontend development, with a strong focus on building reusable components. I adhere to best practices and am proficient in the most widely used frameworks and solutions in the industry. Throughout my career, I have contributed to a diverse range of projects, from simple forms to complex management systems with multiple tabs and pop-ups, including both building applications from scratch and migrating legacy systems.
